title: Comment from Frank N von Hippel

analysis.key_quote: I object to the stripping of civil service protections from federal employees with substantive expertize in their areas - especially those supervising federal research grants – and replacing them with political operatives with the agenda of subverting the independence of our great research institutions.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about the loss of civil service protections and the potential for politicization of federal research, indicating a defense of merit-based systems and employee rights.
